field.name: description
field.value:
Castle.Facilities.Remoting.RemotingFacility has an obligated attribute "remoteKernelUri" when using it in a client. If your RemotingStrategy is not Component-related, this doesn't make sense.
[extra info] In my specific case, I'm using the RemotingFacility just to enable easy configuration. My "components" are merely activated by the remoting infrastructure, but using the RemotingFacility for configuration allows me to get all services that implement some interface.
